name: akenza-grafana-connector
description: Enables the Akenza Core as Data Source

scripts.deploy: yarn build && rm -rf ./tmp && mkdir -p ./tmp/akenza-grafana-connector && cp -R ./dist/ ./tmp/akenza-grafana-connector/ && cd tmp && zip ./akenza-grafana-connector.zip -r ./akenza-grafana-connector/ && cd .. && rm -Rf ./tmp/akenza-grafana-connector

author: David Giger
